analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0x282ee54f8ecda53d6bb77df4a4134738375a0664.sol:
	Contract XToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x282ee54f8ecda53d6bb77df4a4134738375a0664.sol#215-217)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0x282ee54f8ecda53d6bb77df4a4134738375a0664.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/7/0x282ee54f8ecda53d6bb77df4a4134738375a0664.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/7/0x282ee54f8ecda53d6bb77df4a4134738375a0664.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
